Coverage.Topics covered: Subsystems of a Computer, Instruction Execution Cycle
Programming Languages, Translators, Compiler, Interpreter
Types of Software, Operating System, CPU, Registers
Distribution of Seminar Topics, Software implementation of Instruction, RISC, CISC
RISC design principles, Instruction pipelining, Superscalar architecture, SIMD & Vector processors, Multiprocessor, Multicomputer
Primary memory, Memory address, Cell, Word, Big endian & Little endian systems
(Lab) Shell & Command prompt, shell script & batch program, whoami & users & who commands, ls-l output, metacharacters, cat command, wc command, file permission, chmod command
Cache memory, Cache memory acess time, SIP, DIP, SIMM, DIMM, Memory hierarchy
Functions of Operating System, Long term and Short term scheduler, turn around time, waiting time, response time, FCFS
SJF, Starvation problem, SRTF, Round Robin algorithm
Multilevel Queue Algorithm, Multilevel Feedback Queue Algorithm, Scheduling for Proceses with both CPU and IO bursts
Magnetic Hard Disk, Track, Sector, Cylinder, CAV and CLV, Seek time, Rotational delay, Compact Disk, Digital Versatile Disk, Blu Ray Disk
Bus, Controller, DMA, Keyboard, Touchscreen technologies, LCD, LED, TFT, AMOLED, Mouse technologies
Printers, printer types, Inkjet printer, Laser printer, Dot matrix printer, Thermal printer, Types of operating system
Memory management, Requirements of memory management, Physical and Logical address, Memory partitioning, Fixed partitioning, Equal fixed partition
Unequal fixed partition, Placement algorithms, Dynamic partitioning, Inernal and External fragmentation, Fixed and variable relocation
Paging and Segmentation

Virtual memory, Need of virtual memory, Paging vs virtual paging, Segmentation vs virtual segmentation, Thrashing, Principle of locality of reference, Virtual paging, Address translation in virtual paging
Inverted page table, Translation lookaside buffer, Virtual segmentation, Address translation in virtual segmentation, Segmented paging, Address translation in segmented paging

Deadlock, Necessary conditions for deadlock, Resource allocation graph, Deadlock handling schemes, Ostrich algorithm, Deadlock prevention, Deadlock avoidance, Safe state, Resource allocation graph based algorithm, Banker's algorithm
Shell scripting, echo command, variable creation and display, reading a value from user, writing arithmetic expression, decision making using if-else statement
While loop in shell scripting, Command line argument in shell scripting, For loop in shell scripting
While loop nesting in shell scripting
Shell scripting, Nested loops, Functions, Function arguments, Function return type
Race condition, Critical section problem, Characteristics of a solution to critical section problem, Peterson's algorithm, Bakery algorithm
Introduction to linux environment & basic commands, PATH environmental variable, External & Internal commands
Conducted a C quiz to assess C skills, in between covered some c concepts and number system conversion
Command line arguments, goto statement, c enumerations, preprocessor directives
User header file, Command i/o redirection
Command pipelining, storage classes, predefined macros, C standardization
ssh command, scp command, ftp command, explaination of c statement that performs pre and post incement on the same variable
Review of class, objects, visibility modes, this pointer, constructor, destructor
Reference variable, Parameter passing by reference, Function overloading, string class & functions, Inheritance
Friend function, Friend class, this pointer, Function Overriding
